Review of waves

* frequency
* wavelength
* amplitude
* EM spectrum
* photoelectric effect


Work function of a metal (energy to get an electron out):

$$
KE = hv - \Phi
$$

Quantum numbers:

* $n$ -- size of orbital
* $l$ -- shape of orbital
    * s, p, d, f, g, h
    * $n - 1$
* $m_{l}$ -- orientation in space
    * $2l + 1$
* $m_{s}$ -- spin
    * $2 * m_{l}$

electrons in a shell: $2n^{2}$
